body_html:
Hi Asim,
I will continue to respond to the other issue.
I assume that you can still see it, even though it was closed?
Aside: It would be really helpful to give us a few minutes to respond before closing issues. :-)
We can close this and I will continue on the other issue.
Thanks.
Kevin
